bantam.ast

Class BinaryLogicExpr

  • java.lang.Object
    • bantam.ast.ASTNode
      • bantam.ast.Expr
        • bantam.ast.BinaryExpr
          • bantam.ast.BinaryLogicExpr
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryLogicAndExpr, BinaryLogicOrExpr

    public abstract class BinaryLogicExpr
extends BinaryExpr
    The abstract BinaryLogicExpr class represents boolean logic expressions. It can be either AND ('&&') or OR ('||'). It extends BinaryExpr and contains a lefthand expression and a righthand expression. Most of the functionality can be implemented within the bantam.visitor method for BinaryExpr, however, some functionality may need to be implemented in the bantam.visitor method for each subclass.
    See Also:
    ASTNode, BinaryExpr
